languages.text: Ксавьер Калькасар достаточно доверяет Лорд-капитану, чтобы разделить с {mf|ним|ней} бремя заботы о Просторе Коронус. В результате важного совещания он поручил попечению династии фон Валанциус судьбу атакованного мира Ефрат-II.

Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Ксавьер Калькасар достаточно доверяет Лорд-капитану, чтобы разделить с {mf|ним|ней} бремя заботы о Просторе Коронус. В результате важного совещания он поручил попечению династии фон Валанциус судьбу атакованного мира Ефрат-II.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar fait suffisamment confiance {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} pour partager avec {mf|lui|elle} le fardeau de la protection des Étendues de Koronus. Au terme de cette rencontre historique, le seigneur inquisiteur a confié le sort d'Euphrate-II, actuellement en danger, à la maison von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar fait suffisamment confiance {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} pour partager avec {mf|lui|elle} le fardeau de la protection des Étendues de Koronus. Au terme de cette rencontre historique, le seigneur inquisiteur a confié le sort d'Euphrate-II, actuellement en danger, à la maison von Valancius.

languages.text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎十分信任行商浪人，愿意与{mf|他|她}共同承担守护科罗努斯扩区的重任。当这场重要会议结束时，大审判官将欧夫拉茨二号星的命运托付给了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎十分信任行商浪人，愿意与{mf|他|她}共同承担守护科罗努斯扩区的重任。当这场重要会议结束时，审判长将欧夫拉茨二号星的命运托付给了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。

languages.text: ザビエル・カルカサルは、コロヌス・エクスパンスを保護するという負担を分かち合うほどロード・キャプテンに信頼を寄せている。2人の重要な会談は、現在危機に瀕しているユーフラテス・IIの統治する世界の運命を、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に託すというロード・インクィジターの決断をもって締めくくられた。
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: ザビエル・カルカサルは、コロヌス・エクスパンスを保護するという負担を分かち合うほどロード・キャプテンに信頼を寄せている。2人の重要な会談は、現在危機に瀕しているユーフラテス・IIの統治する世界の運命を、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に託すというロード・インクィジターの決断をもって締めくくられた。

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar vertraut dem Lord Captain genug, um die Last der Verteidigung der Koronus-Ausdehnung mit ihm zu teilen. Das monumentale Treffen der beiden endete damit, dass der Großinquisitor das Schicksal der aktuell bedrohten Welt Eufrates II in die Hände des Hauses Valancius legte.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar vertraut dem Lord Captain genug, um die Last der Verteidigung der Koronus-Ausdehnung mit ihm zu teilen. Das monumentale Treffen der beiden endete damit, dass der Großinquisitor das Schicksal der aktuell bedrohten Welt Eufrates II in die Hände des Hauses Valancius legte.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar confía suficientemente en {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán como para compartir con {mf|él|ella} la carga de defender la Extensión de Koronus. El monumental encuentro terminó cuando el Lord Inquisidor encomendó el destino del planeta Eufrates II, que actualmente corre peligro, a la casa von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar trusts the Lord Captain enough to share the burden of safeguarding the Koronus Expanse with {mf|him|her}. Their momentous meeting concluded with the Lord Inquisitor entrusting the fate of the world of Eufrates II, currently endangered, into the purview of House von Valancius.
